Game.Name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (Europe)
Game.plot: The chase is on... all the way to the greatest treasure in history - the Holy Grail! And if you can survive the treacherous caves of Colorado, a savage rat attack, and overcome the deadly traps of the Grail temple, then you're ready for anything the Luftwaffe can throw at you!Hints:- Level Select -When the Locusfilm Logo appears enter the following code....A - B - C - B - C - A - C - A - BYou should hear a ''Shhhh'' in confirmation, and you will have access to all of the levelshttp://www.gamefaqs.com/console/genesis/data/586244.htmlCheat: Level Select (3 Button Controller)When the Locusfilm Logo appears enter the following code.... A - B - C - B - C - A - C - A - B You should hear a ''Shhhh'' in confirmation, and you will have access to all of the levels
Game.Notes: Your task is to find the Holy Grail. Before this can be done you must find the Cross of Coronado, a shield and a diary.
